name: Website: cleaner - Blogo.it
description:
Ads remover 
for all blogo.it sites
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
domain("yachtandsail.it"), 
domain("02blog.it"), 
domain("06blog.it"), 
domain("artsblog.it"), 
domain("autoblog.it"), 
domain("benessereblog.it"), 
domain("blogvoip.it"), 
domain("booksblog.it"), 
domain("calcioblog.it"), 
domain("cineblog.it"), 
domain("clickblog.it"), 
domain("comicsblog.it"), 
domain("deluxeblog.it"), 
domain("designerblog.it"), 
domain("downloadblog.it"), 
domain("ecoblog.it"), 
domain("englishblog.it"), 
domain("fashionblog.it"), 
domain("finanzablog.it"), 
domain("gadgetblog.it"), 
domain("gamesblog.it"), 
domain("gossipblog.it"), 
domain("gustoblog.it"), 
domain("happyblog.it"), 
domain("melablog.it"), 
domain("mobileblog.it"), 
domain("motoblog.it"), 
domain("motorsportblog.it"), 
domain("ossblog.it"), 
domain("outdoorblog.it"), 
domain("pinkblog.it"), 
domain("polisblog.it"), 
domain("queerblog.it"), 
domain("softblog.it"), 
domain("soldiblog.it"), 
domain("soundsblog.it"), 
domain("toysblog.it"), 
domain("travelblog.it"), 
domain("tvblog.it")

{
div[style="text-align: center;"],
[id*="bglink"],
[id*="leaderboard_sponsor"],
[id*="google_ads"],
[href*="google_ad_client"],[src*="google_ad_client"],
[href*="google-adsense"],[src*="google-adsense"],
[href*="pagead2.googlesyndication.com"],
[src*="pagead2.googlesyndication.com"],
[href*=".it/adsense"],
[src*=".it/adsense"],
[href*=".it/sponsor"],
[src*=".it/sponsor"],
[src*=".doubleclick.net"],
[href*=".doubleclick.net"],
div[style="clear:both;padding: 0px; font-size: 9px; margin-bottom: 6px;border-bottom: solid 1px #cccccc;"],
DIV[style="margin-top: 6px; padding: 0px; font-size: 9px; margin-bottom: 0px;"],
#FLASH_AD,
.ads-articolo,
.sponsored,
.ad336x280,
.ad300x250,
.ads-titolo,
.ads-articolo,
.ads-index,
.ads-index-notext,
#firstAdUnit,
.autoad,
#plugin-overlay-ad,
#overlay-inner,
#overlay-close
{display:none!important}

body {background-image:none!important;
      background-color: #E5E5E5!important;}
}
